articles.description: The Ignition Series will kick off on Friday with the European G2 Esports Invitational, presented by RedBull, and the RAGE VALORANT JAPAN Invitational.
articles.content:
Riot Games today announced the Ignition Series, the publisher's first step to building the VALORANT esports scene.
Riot Games has partnered with more than 20 esports organizations to create Ignition… [+2318 chars]

articles.title: Classic CoD party mode returning to Modern Warfare - Dexerto
articles.description: This classic Party mode from the original Black Ops game is arriving in Modern Warfare very soon, as part of Season 4.
articles.content:
A classic Call of Duty mode is returning to Modern Warfare this week, alongside a bunch of new content following the launch of Season 4.
As always, the powers that be at Modern Warfare are looking t… [+1887 chars]

articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Ferrari ruined its ‘Rendez-vous’ revival with digital image stabilization - The Verge
articles.description: Ferrari paid homage to the classic 1976 short film C’était un rendez-vous with a new version filmed in Monaco. But the video falls flat, despite featuring F1 star Charles Leclerc ad Ferrari’s new 1,000-horsepower hybrid hypercar, the SF90 Stradale.
articles.content: This is when you actually want the footage to be shaky
